paragraph.text: Explicabo itaque possimus dignissimos? Repudiandae tempore, fugit illum? Iure error omnis eveniet eius iste molestias. Veritatis provident hic voluptate voluptatibus ullam accusantium, obcaecati tempora soluta praesentium accusamus sed dicta sapiente.

steps.accordionLabel: Expand step for doing this in person
steps.title: In Person at State Parks

paragraph.text: Most parks and beaches that charge daily parking fees sell MassParks Passes at their contact stations during their paid parking seasons. Just ask to purchase a MassParks Pass and show your driver’s license or proof of residency. Please note: most parks cannot accept credit cards, so you’ll have to pay with cash or a check.

steps.accordionLabel: Expand step for doing this in person
steps.title: Some Other Method

paragraph.text: If you concentrate really hard, a pass might magically appear in front of you

steps.accordionLabel: Expand step for doing this in person
steps.title: Online

paragraph.text: You can also order a MassParks pass online through Reserve America. There is an additional $2.75 charge to use this online service. Your pass will be mailed to your home within seven days.

steps.accordionLabel: Expand step for doing this in person
steps.title: By Phone

paragraph.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque rutrum mauris quam, et imaperdiet purus pellentesque vel.

steps.accordionLabel: Expand step for doing this in person
steps.title: By Mail

paragraph.text:
(only if you're purchasing a Senior MassParks Pass)
Senior MassParks Passes can be purchased by mail by writing to the following address:

DCR MassParks
251 Causeway Street
Boston, MA 02114
Attn: Senior MassParks Pass Coordinator

and including a photocopy of your MA driver’s license or other official proof of MA residency and age, and a check for $10 made payable to the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.

steps.accordionLabel: Expand step for doing this in person
steps.title: By Fax

unorderedList.text: Download and fill out an application for an EIN.

sublist.text: If you include your fax number, an EIN will be faxed to you within 4 business days.
